resources.string:
"Tips:
1.Default Password is same as email ID.
2.Changing email ID and registering will create a new account with that email. All other details are editable.
3.Tap "Clear All Fields" to enter a new email id for another account."

"Tips:
1.This app does not change the password for existing accounts.
2.Since every account is tied to an email, the email cannot be changed. All other details are editable.
3.Tap "Clear All Fields" to clear everything except the email."
